DESCRIPTION.P: This block routes one of the regular inputs to the unique regular output. the choice of which input is to be routed is done, initially by the "initial connected input" parameter. Then, every time an input event arrives on the i-th input event port, the i-th regular input port is routed to the regular output.

ITEMIZE.label: DIALOGUE PARAMETERS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : a scalar. Number of regular and event inputs.
: an integer. It must be between 1 and the number of inputs.
